::Hot Rod::

He turned to Feline as she was hit.
"Feline..."
The fire net traped him.
"Arcangel! You lie! I came here to talk to Magnus. He is my friend!"

::DrillBit::

He arrived at the base.
"DrillBit, terrorize." 
He transformed, and found KitKat.
"Hey lovely!"
